sys_script_include.name: ReservationUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_0a1e0df1834e0a10edb56060ceaad374
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383179_tradenow.ReservationUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ReservationUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ReservationUtils = Class.create();
ReservationUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

   setReservationEndTime: function(minutes) {
      var current_time = new GlideDateTime();
      current_time.addSeconds(minutes*60);
      var reservation_end = current_time.getDisplayValue(); // Get the display value of the datetime
      return reservation_end;
   },

   type: 'ReservationUtils'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>shyamal</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 06:46:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>0a1e0df1834e0a10edb56060ceaad374</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReservationUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="TradeNow" source="x_1383179_tradenow">48d5320c837d0610edb56060ceaad314</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="TradeNow">48d5320c837d0610edb56060ceaad314</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0a1e0df1834e0a10edb56060ceaad374</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>shyamal</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 06:52:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
